description: Scotland prop Luke Bain reaches an agreement to leave Wakefield Trinity and head back to Australia.
title: Luke Bain: Wakefield Trinity forward leaves to return to Australia
title_page: Luke Bain: Wakefield Trinity forward leaves to return to Australia - BBC Sport
maintext:
Wakefield Trinity forward Luke Bain has left the club by mutual consent to return to Australia.
Bain, 24, played for Wakefield last season as they won the second-tier Championship.
But the prop, who played all three games for Scotland in the 2022 World Cup, has reached an agreement to leave the club.
Trinity face Leeds Rhinos next month in their first game back in Super League.
